named-query.name: Vehiculo.findByMatricula
named-query.query: select v from Vehiculo v left join fetch v.averias where v.matricula= :matricula

named-query.name: Curso.findByCodigo
named-query.query: select c from Curso c where c.codigo= :codigo

named-query.name: Asistencia.findByMecanico
named-query.query: select a from Asistencia a where a.mecanico= :mecanico

named-query.name: Asistencia.findByCurso
named-query.query: select a from Asistencia a where a.curso= :curso

named-query.name: Averia.findById
named-query.query: select a from Averia a where id= :id

named-query.name: Averia.findByVehiculoId
named-query.query: select a from Averia a where vehiculo_id= :vehiculo_id
